page.title: 14CAISTOR LAND & HOUSE PRICES
page.content: House prices in this region are some of the cheapest in the country.In August 1985,Mawer,Mason & Bell were advertising the following properties: { 60,North St.a terraced cottage with fitted kitchen, split level cooker, lounge,double bedroom, bathroom and outbuildings:{ Â£16,500. { 12,Lincoln Drive,a spacious,detached house with gas central heating, comprising of a cloakroom,dining room, lounge,kitchen,utility room,4 bedrooms bathroom,garage,carport,front & rear gardens:{Â£38,500 { Quarry View,Spa Top,with cloakroom, hall,lounge,dining area,fitted kitchen breakfast room,utility room,4 bedrooms one with en suite bathroom plus a snooker room/bedroom,balocony,bathroom 2 double garages.Good views of Water Hills:{Â£80,000
